title: Recruiting High Silvers low Golds for rank 5 Team (Lucky6s)
body:
Hey,
I'm starting a rank team that's semi active, Lucky6s.
Currently looking for a Top, Adc, Support. 
Top:
Jungle: Mr Ghex (Gold5)
Mid: uhScotty (Silver2)
Adc:
Support:

If your interested in apply for the roles, leave a comment with your current rank and your champions which you play for your main role and also your name.
Feel free to message me or add: uhScotty

replies.body:
I'm not on often but I'll join and play whenever I can if you want. 
I'm Gold 2 (climbed from Silver 5 and still going) and main Mid/ADC
IGN : OgggaWogga
Hahahahaha, "silver 3/2 but we could climb easily if we tried"
Hey, Looking for a team, am G4 currently and can play Lucian/Jinx/ Adc or thresh support. Names Troxa (evidently)
